phase_context: Early design validation phase focusing on survey accuracy, existing conditions documentation, and title sheet setup. At 30%, the emphasis is on verifying that foundational data is correct before design work begins.
what_should_exist: Completed topographic survey with QA checklist
Title sheet with correct project info
North arrows and scales on all sheets
Existing utilities shown from GIS/utility maps

section_guidance.GENERAL REVIEW / ALL SHEETS: Focus on survey accuracy, title block consistency, and existing conditions documentation. Verify all foundational elements are in place before design proceeds.

example_evaluations.item_text: Do all drawings have a north arrow shown correctly?
example_evaluations.comment: North arrow verified on sheets C-1 through C-8, consistently oriented at top of sheet near title block.

example_evaluations.item_text: Are existing contours shown and labeled?
example_evaluations.comment: Existing contours shown on C-2 and C-3 but not labeled with elevations. Add 1-foot interval labels per CADD standards.

example_evaluations.item_text: Is the underground utility locator note present?
example_evaluations.comment: MISS DIG / underground utility locator note missing from title sheet. Required note must be added before 60% submittal.

example_evaluations.item_text: Are all existing underground utilities shown and labeled?
example_evaluations.comment: Existing water (blue), sanitary (green), storm (gray), and gas (yellow) utilities shown and labeled on sheets C-2 through C-5. Sizes and materials indicated.

example_evaluations.item_text: Confirm utilities provided match GIS and utility maps (if applicable)
example_evaluations.comment: Unable to verify GIS match from plan sheets alone. Recommend PM verify utility locations against municipal GIS records before proceeding.

pass_criteria: Item is clearly shown on the plans with accurate information that meets survey and documentation standards for 30% design phase.
fail_criteria: Item is missing, incorrectly shown, or contains errors that must be corrected before advancing to 60% design.
review_criteria: Only use when verification requires external data (GIS records, field verification) not visible on the plan sheets.
